title: [Ta'Illistim, Glamesine Var]
description: A catwalk stretches between the two tall granite buildings that frame the narrowing var.  Thick green vines spill out of planters set into the catwalk to form a leafy veil.  In the cool night air, the vine's heart-shaped green leaves have opened to reveal large white flowers that fill the var with a delightful fragrance.

A catwalk stretches between the two tall granite buildings that frame the narrowing var.  Thick green vines spill out of planters set into the catwalk, forming a leafy veil that partially obscures the buildings to the north.

Two buildings frame the narrowing var, with an arched trellis stretching between them and over the road.  The framework is lush with green vines, which spill out and down, forming a leafy veil.  In the night air, the vine's heart-shaped green leaves have opened to reveal large white flowers.
Two buildings frame the narrowing var, with an arched trellis stretching between them and over the road.  The framework is lush with green vines, which spill out and down, forming a leafy veil.
